title: Mount Airy Casino Resort

text: Excellent Resort. I love aroma thru out the hotel.  My advice, as with all resorts, read and/ or ask questions about  the extra added fees so that you can be fully aware of the cost. My week stay was relaxing.
title: Mount Airy Casino Resort

text: This casino is an hour away from me but I like going once in a while. It's more of a stress reliever for me... NOT A WINNERðŸ¤£ place is very clean and waitresses are really nice. Guy Fiery's Restaurant not good, except for the burgers. I also like that they keep some of the old machines I like.
title: Mount Airy Casino Resort

text: The cleanest hotel rooms, my kids can basically crawl on the floor and not a speck of dirt on them!
title: Mount Airy Casino Resort

text: Friendly and attentive staff from the valet parkers to customer service (check-in). Our room was very clean and well deodorized. The whole place was well taken care of. Would definitely go back.
title: Mount Airy Casino Resort

text: Very classy and clean. Everyone was dressed to impress. I love feeling like I was stepping back in time when I was playing the slot machines. I only went to the casino part so I don't know anything about the hotel. This place is huge I had to asked the staff witch way I came in as I was lost and couldn't remember where I parked my car ðŸ˜‚ luckily these two men remembered witch way we came and pointed us to the right direction. I love ðŸ˜ how beautiful everything was.
title: Mount Airy Casino Resort

text: This place is very clean. They take your temperature at the door, they clean the machines often and the staff are very friendly ðŸ˜! They have a large selection of slot machines to choose from. I do recommend Mount Airy Casino, it's a fun time. We even saw a rainbow on our way in! A+++
title: Mount Airy Casino Resort

text: The design of the building is attractive. The location in the mountains and the lake in front are picturesque. We went on a Sunday afternoon and it was quite busy. The grounds and building were clean. The one negative that stood out to me was the lack of staff. Having a long wait in line to get a rewards card and difficulty in finding a drink waitress. There are plenty of slot machines and table games. The outside music venue looked great. I look forward to returning this summer to attend a concert.
title: Mount Airy Casino Resort

text: I stayed here for Valentine's Day weekend. The hotel was beautiful. We stayed in a king suite. It was top notch. The room was really nice and spacious. There one thing that I did not like about the hotel was that they had no refrigerator in the room. Ice machines were available though. The service was nice. The bell guy Bob was really nice. He bought all of my luggage up to my room and put everything away for me. I was amazed about the hospitality here. When valet bought me my car, they had my heated seats on for me. I like that the people at the hotel care about you. My bathroom was huge with his/ her sinks. My husband and I could fit in the shower together. I had a mini bar in my room. I will stay here again when I visit the Poconos. I kept winning at the casino. I played the slot machines(Wheel of Fortune $1 machine). Overall, fun and great experience
title: Mount Airy Casino Resort

text: Since I don't have photos from the night, here's a card I made for my mom. I took her here for her 50th birthday since some of the other plans I had for her fell through during the pandemic. I should have chosen this first! She loves to gamble and we had so much fun. She really enjoyed herself. I think they did a good job making it a safer place for indoor entertainment; everyone was masked and spaced. My only suggestion would be wipes available for the slots(although I'm not sure the erosive damage this could cause) and periodic hand sanitizing stations. We ended up eating at Guy Fieri's which has classic American food and large portions.
title: Mount Airy Casino Resort

text: I LOVE THE LOCATION OF THIS CASINO.  EARLY MORNING ONE CAN WALK AROUND AND ENJOY THE BEAUTIFUL SURROUNDINGS AND ENVIRONMENT.  I AM A POKER FAN AND LOVE TO PLAY POKER THERE IN THE POKER ROOM.
title: Mount Airy Casino Resort

text: We stayed here last week in the King Suite. The room was 5 stars without a doubt. The hotel itself wasn't too bad either. The only complaint I have is the smell of cigarette smoke right when you walk in which is coming from the casino. The restaurants are overpriced and aren't that great. However, the food from room service is extremely good and reasonably priced. We ended up getting snowed in which was a bit of a bummer for our trip. Unfortunately due to the storm the tvs weren't working either. Luckily we were leaving the next day so it wasn't too bad. We came to the Poconos to do other activities so our stay wasn't based off the resort or casino. With that being said I'd definitely stay here again.
title: Mount Airy Casino Resort

text: This place is very nice and the staff is very friendly and welcoming. If you have a gambling problem or don't know how to walk away then you shouldn't come but they're other friends of entertainment that you might enjoy. Famous restaurants to eat at, a lounge, a pool, a golf course depending on  the weather and planned events so if be sure to look up the events if you want to attend so you can book accordingly.
title: Mount Airy Casino Resort

text: Our stay was good until we went to check out, they surprised us with a charge on our room is not related to us ( the time of charge is prior the time we arrived to the hotel) the front desk lady charged  us without my authorization since she has the card information to pay the full balance even this is not our charge, and said that we can complain to the credit card. She didn't even bother to check this charge. Very careless and bad customer service
title: Mount Airy Casino Resort

text: Nice place but we did not win...WTH. Maybe next time. Still had fun.
title: Mount Airy Casino Resort

text:
As a whole this was an amazing experience. One criticism that I would have is that you to pay a $20 a night resort fee and then when you go to the pool there is an indoor outdoor pool combination and a tunnel that connects the 2. But they did not heat The outdoor pool and the water in the indoor pool was quite cold as the to waters intermixed.
The sports book is a lot of fun and the fact that we could take our own food and beverage is in there made it all the more.
title: Mount Airy Casino Resort

text: Came here for a honeymoon back in 99' upon entering the property I was surprised that it has been completely renovated. With that being said the casino is laid out beautifully and the service is great. The staff is  friendly and professional too.  The buffet was also great to try everything is fresh and great quality.
title: Mount Airy Casino Resort

text: We went away for a few days in the Poconos. I had no idea this place was still around. We took a hotel shuttle to the casino and walked around a bit. It's very nice, pretty, with gaming tables. We played roulette for a couple hours and made some good cash. I really liked it. Can't wait to go back. We ate a late night snack at Guy Fieris, yummy.
title: Mount Airy Casino Resort

text: Very nice accommodations.  Extremely pleasant atmosphere.  Great staff all around. From the valets, customer service, security,  dealers, pro shop, starter, housekeeping were all extraordinarily.
title: Mount Airy Casino Resort

text: Great place! We really enjoyed ourselves. All the staff are very friendly and offered tons of knowledge for it being our first time on a few of the table games! We stopped in at the restaurant and it was 5 stars all the way around, great friendly staff there as well! Must stop in if your I'm the area! Thanks again to all the staff that helped us!
title: Mount Airy Casino Resort

text: Lovely place. Great casino. Very clean. They have a company come in and disinfect every room between visitors. Restaurants surrounding the casino floor, so there's plenty to do and eat.
title: Mount Airy Casino Resort

text: This place is great, they are top notch clean and professional.  Very attentive and polite. The beds are comfortable and you cant get excess to the hotel rooms from the elevator without a key. You will need it for the elevator to move. The pool was nice and big with options to go outside or stay inside. The only thing is there is no hot tub which is what I was looking for.  They have about 4 restaurants onsite and a casino all in the same location. We went to the buffet which h coat about 16.99 a person. Food and desert was really good. Drinks are included in that price. They have a guys burger which was really good.we got to the hotel early and there no hesitation to allow us to have our room early.  It was cleaned amd ready. They dont really have a walking trail which is what I was looking for giving the location and the beautiful views here. This hotel has high glass decorations all over bery detailed amd beautiful I really enjoyed. They had a bar are at the pool which is were you would get your towels. Like I said the food was good the rooms were very nice. I got a glass stand up shower. The toilet has it's own door for extra privacy. You will not regret coming here I would say a 5 star hotel for sure.
title: Mount Airy Casino Resort

text: Beautiful property. Great staff. Good food. Didn't win at casino but ðŸ¤·ðŸ½â€â™€ï¸. Very accommodating.
title: Mount Airy Casino Resort

text: Not a bad place went to Gui Fieri restaurant 24/7 diner. They only serve 1 breakfast option all day long. But the food was amazing. I had the pulled pork and I could barely finish my fries. It was amazing but kind of pricey. Good date spot if u have money to spend.
title: Mount Airy Casino Resort

text: I have stayed here before with no issue but this time was different the service was sub-par at best. The ice machine on the main floor was broken so we had to travel to the 2nd floor and sometimes the 3rd floor to get ice. Tonight it was late so we called room service for some ice water not only did we call 3x but I finally had to call the front desk to call them just to bring the water. Over an hour later here they come with 5 cups of water and charged $10.00. Then said It's room service, It's not my fault the ice machine is inoperable and has been since the day we arrived, and we made management aware of the ice machineand he said we will get that taken care of immediately if immediately was a date it would be when the pandemic is over! Needless to say I won't be back it only takes one time for the foolishness!
title: Mount Airy Casino Resort

text: Great casino...nice slot choices and lots of winners (that I witnessed & myself included)...clean rooms with very comfortable beds and modern design.  Room service food was great but had a horrible experience at the buffet (dirty plates & tasteless food).  Customer service reached out promptly after I reviewed on FB...asked for my number to discuss but never called. Overall I'd definitely go back...I mean comp rooms so why not, plus the other restaurants were good.
title: Mount Airy Casino Resort

text: Nice rainy day place to enjoy. Not sure of the views do to the weather, but I think we could have seen the mountains from there. Beautiful decor inside. We dinned at the Buffet and food was delicious and they had many choices for all palates. We even walked out being winners. We enjoyed our visit.
title: Mount Airy Casino Resort

text: We ate at the Guy Fieri grill. The  fried macaroni balls with the cheese bacon fondue was incredible!  The blood Mary with the candied bacon was the best. My fiance had the west coast burger it was superb! The slots were generous the food was delicious. Hands down one of the best casinos resort entertainment on the east coast! Thank you so much for a wonderful evening!
title: Mount Airy Casino Resort

text: Great stay at the Mystic Marriott, hotel and spa. I was a little reluctant before staying there, having read a few negative reviews, but my stay was extremely pleasant. The staff was very helpful and introduced all the hotel amenities to us. The rooms were modern, clean and well equipped. The indoor pool is also good for some winter time fun. the breakfast buffet at the octagon restaurant is very diverse and filling.
title: Mystic Marriott Hotel & Spa

text: Very nice place with great food. The breakfast buffet was top notch. The swimming pool was a little cold but was still nice. We are going back soon.
title: Mystic Marriott Hotel & Spa

text: Modern inside look, great breakfast being 5 stars.  The beds were way too soft and warn.  There was no moisturizer in the room, but mostly clean room.  The bathroom was tight including a smaller than normal toilet. The overnight volume from wedding parties all night long was leaving many guest with little sleep.
title: Mystic Marriott Hotel & Spa

text: Room is clean. Great service. Location is great if you drive a car. Not much stores within walking distance.
title: Mystic Marriott Hotel & Spa

text: Nice modern hotel with a big pool. Rooms are spacious & clean. Gym had plenty of machines & exercise equipment. Starbucks is also on premises. BEWARE of the bar restaurant for takeout food. Was sitting at bar having a beer, decided to take food to go, was charged a 15% service charge for food to go. I confirmed it the next day a the front desk. The Marriott has no control over this charge itâ€™s the restaurants policy. See the pic of the receipt.
title: Mystic Marriott Hotel & Spa

text: Lots of meetings and weddings happening in this large hotel. Rooms were nice, staff was very helpful, and the breakfast was good. My only negative comment was that the 3 EV chargers on site were in TERRIBLE condition. We could only sometimes get 1 to work. It is a very nice perk when available.
title: Mystic Marriott Hotel & Spa

text: Great service, nice ambiance in various areas, nice fitness center and clean room. Will stay again when I'm in the area
title: Mystic Marriott Hotel & Spa

text:
I've stayed at a lot of Marriotts because of business trips in the past 10 years. They usually don't fall below a certain standard, but it seems in this case they did.

The rooms were pricey and we had booked a room with 2 queen beds and they gave us a room with a king and a sofa bed. Now you might think of this as an upgrade if you had a couple booking the room, but this was for 3 people and getting a sofa bed when you have paid for a queen. When i mentioned this in the app, they said they would fix it the next day and they did, and they have us the room right next to ours which made for a very easy transfer through the connecting door, which is what raised my review from 1 star to 2.

I suspect they changed our booking because they were having a convention and needed the room but this isn't an acceptable reason.

Other things that bothered me were the cleanliness of the rooms. I attached a couple of photos showing what our floor was like in the first room and the dirt inside the coffee maker. In both rooms, the coffee makers were terrible with one even having hair in it.

Finally it saddens me to see a sad attempt to look progressive with 3 places to charge an electric car. 2 Tesla spots of which 1 was it of order and 1 for non Tesla electric cars.

If you want to add electric car charging to your hotel add 10 spots not have a token amount and not even functional

I think they rely on the event housing so much they don't really care about their amenities is status of their rooms so much. Because every night we were there they had all least 2 events going on.

For the price and the quality, might as well just stay in mystic close to everything. I don't think I will be going back to this specific Marriott.
title: Mystic Marriott Hotel & Spa

text:
This place was fantastic! The staff were amazing! The rooms were very nice, but the interior design sucked. Marriott corporate, hire a decorator that has actually stayed in a hotel room!

You have to walk a long way to your rooms. It would be nice if there was another elevator.

The concierge was amazing and went above and beyond, but the lounge was small and there weren't enough food options.

The food at the restaurant in the hotel was really good. The lobby is a great place to meet and they have free flavored water. Plenty of free parking.

For the hospitality alone, I will certainly come back the next time I'm in the area.
title: Mystic Marriott Hotel & Spa

text: CLEAN place to stay but is under renovation.  A few mis steps with the renovation- shower has no trays, glass work area top looks good but an optical mouse doesnâ€™t work, nice air handler but it made a banging noise every time it started, small sink area barely enough room for a guys toiletries let alone 2 peoples stuff, LOTS of towels was good.  They put me in a handicap room so I donâ€™t know yet what a standard room is like but this one was probably roomier than standard.  Buffet breakfast was OK but not great - all employees were very nice!
title: Mystic Marriott Hotel & Spa

text: Would leave a higher rating if it wasn't a 4 star hotel. My room looked out to the rooftop and a tall white wall around its perimeter. Couldn't see anything but the wall and a little sky, and the windows were quite dirty. Not a big deal for a business stay, but if we're paying weekend prices at a 4 Star hotel, it seems sub-par. ($876 incl. taxes for two nights) Needed to go down to the desk at one point on Saturday evening and couldn't find someone to acknowledge me for five minutes. That said, the rooms were kept clean and breakfast service was nice.
title: Mystic Marriott Hotel & Spa

text: It was a very enjoyable stay, it was recently updated with the most modern conveniences there's a new Starbucks restaurant in the facility The breakfast buffet was outstanding. There's a new bar in the establishment but I did not attend or use it but it looks very inviting.
title: Mystic Marriott Hotel & Spa

text:
Great place for the money. Staff are nice and accommodating as they were prompt in responding to my special requests. The rooms are redone now and have a more contemporary look. Rooms are big enough and feel good... i didn't like the floors or why they clean them. The floors are laminate and with extra cleaning product it felt slippery and I almost slipped.
Otherwise I like this place and will continue to stay here.
title: Mystic Marriott Hotel & Spa

text: I had high expectations for this property based on its category and price range. It did not deliver in accordance to its value and how it was advertised. The room I was initially given was not properly cleaned. There were clear signs that the fitted sheet was not laundered. I had to switch rooms, which unfortunately was a downgrade, and there were cleanliness issues in that room as well. The room amenities were lacking, which again is surprising based on category and price. The spa was closed, as well as the hot tub. Those items played a big role in my decision, so I was quite disappointed to find out they were closed. Why didn't the price and category reflect these changes. They are being very misleading, and that's enough to turn me away from Marriott properties. My main concern is they are still advertising as if they have everything together during these times and are charging inflated prices. I am highly upset I did not receive what was expected and now feel like my money put into this property is a major loss. The only thing that was nice is the customer service of the front office staff. The lady taking our breakfast room service order was a little off putting. There was a mistake made with my order. I called to let her know but she seemed upset at me for letting her know their mistake. It was corrected, but her tone was unsettling. The toast was overcooked and stale. Everything else, the omelet, pancakes, chicken sausage, bacon, and potatoes, was made fine. Unfortunately, I will not be returning to this property and do not recommend it.
title: Mystic Marriott Hotel & Spa

text: Newly renovated lobby and rooms.  Love the new layout and renovations.  The rooms are modern and clean.  The floors are laminate so very different from the carpeted floors they had before. I personally liked them but some people prefer carpet.  I wish they had given me slippers to wear in the room as that would have made it more comfortable.
title: Mystic Marriott Hotel & Spa

text: Potential to be a great hotel, however my stay in room 537 left a lot to be desired. Room wasn't ready when's we arrived after 4 P.M..  Had to get ready for a wedding, so we changed into our finest in a locker room.  Came back after midnight and we were given a room without A/C, just a noisy fan from the front desk to keep cool by. Room was sparsely appointed with no chair for the desk or chair for that matter to relax in.  To tired to request a different room, so we just crashed on the heavenly beds until morning.  Bathroom appeared to be recently refurbished, but otherwise great.  Breakfast was great, but had to wait a half hour to be seated.  Staff was always warm and helpful.
title: Mystic Marriott Hotel & Spa

text:
It's a high quality hotel featuring a spa, restaurant, and contemporary rooms.  Reception was friendly and attentive and offered me bottled water and fresh fruit.  The rooms were modern with sliding door showers, a chaise lounge, and a desk.

I'm not particularly fond of hard ceramic hotel room floors as they can be noisy when someone drops something on them (in the middle of the night).  Additionally, I found the bed and pillows to be uncomfortably soft.  I sank down into the bed and could never quite get comfortable.  Maybe I could have slept better on the floor.
title: Mystic Marriott Hotel & Spa

text: This hotel is AMAZING!! For the price and what you get it is WELL worth it!! My fiance and I stayed here to go to see Brantly Gilbert and Dylan Scott which was very convenient being 15 min away. The rooms were very modern and upscale. Very clean, staff was very friendly and offering assistance throughout our stay. They have a buffet breakfast that was better than any hotel I've ever stayed in. It was real fresh food not that processed stale taste. A chef makes omletes with your fillings right in front of you. They have a upscale restaurant called the OCTAGON it is pricey but well worth it. We had ours delivered via room service!! Their filet mignon is to die for. I highly recommend this hotel and I will be staying with them again
title: Mystic Marriott Hotel & Spa

text: One of my favorite spots on the Connecticut Shore; close to Mystic Seaport and Watch Hill Rhode Island. We try to get down there at least three times a year during the spring and summer seasons. Just a great place to go for a romantic weekend.
title: Mystic Marriott Hotel & Spa

text: The staff was quite curtios. I found hair that was not mine in the bed which I found disturbing. Every time that I went swimming I always found long hair on me. Other than that the room was clean for the most part.
title: Mystic Marriott Hotel & Spa

text: Bed sheet had a stain. Shower had hair that was not mine.
title: Mystic Marriott Hotel & Spa

text: I visited the location for a conference. Very spacious meeting areas. Use of conference reception for attendees and customer service oriented staff were greatly appreciated. The images are if the conference spaces and exterior of the hotel and events.
title: Mystic Marriott Hotel & Spa

text: The wings at the resturant are great! Nice quiet, clean and proffesional atmospere. There is also a Starbucks in the hotel. It was never too busy to walk right up, very quick delivery of my coffee. Thank you for a great experience.
title: Mystic Marriott Hotel & Spa

text: Great place, clean, friendly staff, lots of convenience with the onsite restaurant, room service and indoor pool. Would highly recommend, one of the better hotels in the area.
title: Mystic Marriott Hotel & Spa

text: The staff was awesome.  We enjoyed our stay.   I believe it was Tina whip was our dining room attendant.  Most helpful and over the top enthusiasm!
title: Mystic Marriott Hotel & Spa
